changelog: - logic fixed for Desert Palace Backentrance access
- bunch of small changes to account for the duplicate smallkeys with and without _drop in the name
- removed the keydrop variants becuase got to work within one variant. only distinction again is the connection method
- layout change now works and changes when keydropshuffle is de-/actived
- fixed Spwam Palace Logic, Hammer was not considered needed in inverted glitchless setting
- changed rules for purple chests access but not really tested.
- settings auto-tracking can now be enabled without reconnecting the tracker.
- Split into multiple variants to avoid interferane of AP and SNES scripts while tracking. When AP variants are choosen the SNES will be visible but the script does not get loaded!!!
- STIL NO autrotracking of settings in SNES variants
- multiple logic fixes for all modi
- added the possiblity to track key under pots or dropped from enemies. But ONLY via SNES interface!!
- keydrop locations can be made visible in the AP variants but are NOT marked of automatically!!!
- added a small sleep timer for SNES script to prevent location/item overrides on save&quit. DOWNSIDE is that the script may load and 'hang' for 2-3 at first -/reconnects
- added MINOR and OVERWORLD glitched logic. some things/tricks may be missing. please report them
- current glichtes are: waterwalk, fakeflipper, hera-pot, hammerless swamp, ice place mirror warp, hera/gt screen wrap, corner/slope clips
- NEITHER ice breaker nor IP bombjump are implemented into IP logic
- Bunny rivivals are NOT concidered 'in Logic'
- Spike Cave checks for hearthcount or availability of bottles and 'cane of byrna' or 'magic cape' including potions or fairies....14+ hearts is the threshold
- TR access and internal logic is stil WIP and may missreport availability or lack there off
- Flute is now considered ACTIVE uppon receiving
- auto fetching of medelion enabled (setting to turn off will come later)
- fixed purple chest availability (initial idea did not work)
- fixed spike cave availability, (added hammer need)
- fixed swamp palace (missed mirror for one rule)
- visual changes on in_dungeon maps if small-/bigkeys and maps/compasses are vanilla or shuffled
- map/compass/bigkey gets displayed in overwold for every dungeon
- go mode should activate correctly....updates state only when location gets checked or item gets revceived
- tracking of Dungon-bosses and if they are beatable
- almost every check should get tracked
- autotracking for flute activation, Agahnim 1 and 2 defeated and the GT refights not working
- purple chest showing falsely accessible when check on smiths gets collected
- tracking of Dungon-bosses and if they are beatable
- almost every check should get tracked
- autotracking for flute activation, Agahnim 1 and 2 defeated and the GT refights not working
- big-/smallkey, map and compass shuffle option not implemented (current assumption is full-shuffle for everyone of those
